article:
As we all know, the former  Chinese leaders were interested in playing sports, such as ping-pong, basketball and football. _ is President Xi Jinping.
Xi was a sports lover and he used to _ playing football very much. And now he is also one of the football fans in China. He thinks we should not only care about the national team , but also pay much more _ to the training of the young players. So _ he visited Europe  this year, he especially watched China-Germany  youth football match. Although the _ team lost the game in the end, he still encouraged the young players to train harder and _ give up. He told them that they would be the keys to China's football.
Our life is just _ China's football. As Xi once said in Shanghai, "China's football dream looks far away but we cannot stop. You might make your dreams come true one day only if you keep dreaming." So there is _ excuse for us to give up our dreams, and we must try our _ to realize them.
